headline: Danaher predicts $350M tariff hit, moves to mitigate impact on profits
summary: The company is planning manufacturing footprint changes, supply chain adjustments, surcharges and cost cutting to limit the impact of the tariffs.

raw.headline: Danaher predicts $350M tariff hit, moves to mitigate impact on profits
